project.name: flora
project.title: FLoRa
project.short-description: A Framework for LoRa (Long Range) networks
project.long-description: FLoRa is a simulation framework for carrying out end-to-end simulations for LoRa networks. FLoRa requires OMNeT++ 6.0 pre10 or later and INET 4.3.1 or later. Visit https://flora.aalto.fi for more information.
